quest.name: Undeserved Praise
journal: Odo needs someone to pass on a message.

dialogue.name: ODO
dialogue.text: Wait, I know you. Forename Surname! Well, this is certainly a welcome surprise. If you don't mind my imposing, I'd like to ask a favor of you.

dialogue.name: ODO
dialogue.text: As you're well aware, the battle at Rhalgr's Reach was gruesome, with heavy losses on both sides. If what I've been told is true, our losses would have been far greater, if not for one brave soul.

dialogue.name: ODO
dialogue.text: He was only a messenger for the Alliance meant to relay information to our commanders, yet he went above and beyond the call of duty seeing the wounded to safety, all the while fending off enemy attacks.

dialogue.name: ODO
dialogue.text: Such heroism is worthy of great praise, and I would thank him myself if I weren't preoccupied with my duties.

dialogue.name: ODO
dialogue.text: They say he's come to Ala Ghiri, and so I would ask you to congratulate him in my stead, as well as the officer who trained such a truehearted soldier.

dialogue.name: ODO
dialogue.text: You'll go and congratulate him for me, won't you? I can only hope he hasn't already left Ala Ghiri.

dialogue.name: MAELSTROMGENERAL
dialogue.text: Unless there's something I can help you with, I must ask that you move along.

dialogue.name: MAELSTROMGENERAL
dialogue.text: What's this? I don't recall doing anything worthy of praise...

dialogue.name: MAELSTROMGENERAL
dialogue.text: With all due respect, you are mistaken. It was a unit of the Twin Adder that was charged with relaying communications to Alliance commanders. I believe a few of their officers are still stationed at Goodblade if you wish to speak with them.

dialogue.name: MAELSTROMGENERAL
dialogue.text: If this soldier did all you claim he truly is deserving of praise. If you wish to speak with him, a few Twin Adder officers should still be stationed at Goodblade.

dialogue.name: TWINADDERGENERAL
dialogue.text: Greetings, adventurer. Is there something I can help you with? If so, please speak up.

dialogue.name: TWINADDERGENERAL
dialogue.text: Hm? Is there some cause for celebration I'm not aware of?

dialogue.name: TWINADDERGENERAL
dialogue.text: I see... Yes, I do recall a man from my unit being assigned that position. Unfortunately I was stationed at Castrum Oriens at the time, so I cannot say for certain who it was.

dialogue.name: TWINADDERGENERAL
dialogue.text: My subordinates would know who it is you seek. However, they are to return home after one final patrol around Ala Ghiri. If you go now, perhaps you can speak with one of them before they leave.

dialogue.name: TWINADDERGENERAL
dialogue.text: My subordinates will be leaving for home after a last patrol of Ala Ghiri. If you wish to speak with them, you should go now.

dialogue.name: TWINADDERSOLDIER
dialogue.text: Please leave... I need to be alone.

dialogue.name: TWINADDERSOLDIER
dialogue.text: I said leave, damn you! Why do you insist on showering me with unwarranted gratitude?

dialogue.name: TWINADDERSOLDIER
dialogue.text: Yes, I was there at Rhalgr's Reach, but I was barely able to escape with my life, let alone save another's.

dialogue.name: TWINADDERSOLDIER
dialogue.text: I'm afraid the man you're looking for isn't here. Such a brave soul, that one. Our mission was done yet he chose to stay on the front lines and save as many as he could. If not for his injuries, he...he would have...

dialogue.name: TWINADDERSOLDIER
dialogue.text: The man died a hero, though I doubt anyone will ever know it. All we can do now is pray he finds peace in the great beyond.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You have arrived too late to offer your praise. However, it is not too late to offer your respects with a solemn prayer.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The wind gently whispers as if in response to your prayer.

dialogue.name: ODO
dialogue.text: How fares the unsung hero of Rhalgr's Reach?

dialogue.name: ODO
dialogue.text: Oh... Oh, I see. Sorry to hear that. I'll have to go pay my respects later.

dialogue.name: ODO
dialogue.text: It's a terrible tragedy to lose such a fine soldier, but through his sacrifice a great many will live to keep fighting the good fight.

dialogue.name: ODO
dialogue.text: We will carry on in his stead, and someday bring a lasting peace to the realm.
